title: True or false questions - ATC, profit, shut down

content.description:
For each of the following statements, indicate whether it is true, false, or uncertain and explain why.

Average total cost is always greater than average variable cost by a constant amount.

In the short run, a perfectly competitive firm always maximizes profit when average total cost is at minimum.

If a firm shuts down in the short run, its profits will equal zero.
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.
